Sentencas: Neutron powder diffraction was used to characterize the layered perovskite PrBaCo2O6 (+) (delta)(PBCO) under in-situ conditions from 573 to 852 degrees C and at pO(2) = 10(-1)-10(-4) atm.
Titulo: An in-situ neutron diffraction study of the crystal structure of PrBaCo2O5 + δ at high temperature and controlled oxygen partial pressure

Sentencas: The data were fit to a tetragonal model in space group P4/mmm.
Titulo: An in-situ neutron diffraction study of the crystal structure of PrBaCo2O5 + δ at high temperature and controlled oxygen partial pressure

Sentencas: The oxygen vacancies were found to be localized within the Pr layer, with total oxygen stoichiometry between 5.57(1) and 5.17(2).
Titulo: An in-situ neutron diffraction study of the crystal structure of PrBaCo2O5 + δ at high temperature and controlled oxygen partial pressure

Sentencas: This was verified by coulometric titration.
Titulo: An in-situ neutron diffraction study of the crystal structure of PrBaCo2O5 + δ at high temperature and controlled oxygen partial pressure

Sentencas: The location of these vacancies and the anisotropic displacement of the surrounding oxygen anion sites indicate that ion transport occurs via a hopping mechanism between O sites in the Pr layer and the nearest neighbor sites in the Co layer.
Titulo: An in-situ neutron diffraction study of the crystal structure of PrBaCo2O5 + δ at high temperature and controlled oxygen partial pressure

Sentencas: While the direct hopping distance between these sites was found to be greater for PBCO than previously reported for NdBaCo2O5 (+) (delta), the larger radius of Pr3+ stabilizes a higher concentration of mobile anions within the Ln layer.
Titulo: An in-situ neutron diffraction study of the crystal structure of PrBaCo2O5 + δ at high temperature and controlled oxygen partial pressure
